  .inline-reply-tweetbox {
    background-color: #E8F5FD;
  }

</style>

                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Mohammad Yasin MP</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/yasinmpbedford">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">yasinmpbedford</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Member of Parliament for Bedford and Kempston. For enquiries please email me at: mohammad.yasin.mp@parliament.uk</p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">117</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

via <a href="/Survation" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="39523927"><s>@</s><b>Survation</b></a>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour's lead over Conservatives surges to 7% in polls over fears brutal Tory cuts will spark recession

Survation - which accurately predicted last years election result - puts Labour on 44%, with Conservatives trailing on 37% and the Lib Dems at 9%<a href="https://t.co/KLGcI7SurH" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/labours-lead-over-conservatives-surges-12165233" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/labours-lead-over-conservatives-surges-12165233"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">mirror.co.uk/news/politics/</span><span class="invisible">labours-lead-over-conservatives-surges-12165233</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">
        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="971415935281238016" id="stream-item-tweet-971415935281238016" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;971415935281238016&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="971359284947759106" id="stream-item-tweet-971359284947759106" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;971359284947759106&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">One night can make a lifetime of difference, find your nearest <a href="/hashtag/YMCASleepEasy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>YMCASleepEasy</b></a> event at <a href="https://t.co/UTs0mxj2Wx" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://bit.ly/ymcasleepeasy" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://bit.ly/ymcasleepeasy"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">bit.ly/ymcasleepeasy</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> and sleep rough so others don't have to.<a href="https://t.co/auubZA4lze" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/yasinmpbedford/status/969541875375005696" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/yasinmpbedford/status/969541875375005696"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/yasinmpbedford</span><span class="invisible">/status/969541875375005696</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="970238169697300480" id="stream-item-tweet-970238169697300480" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;970238169697300480&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="969541875375005696" data-item-id="969541875375005696" data-permalink-path="/yasinmpbedford/status/969541875375005696" data-conversation-id="969541875375005696" data-tweet-nonce="969541875375005696-8a85fb51-d04f-4189-a148-454ada14b5b3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="yasinmpbedford" data-name="Mohammad Yasin MP" data-user-id="887252498054033408" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;887252498054033408&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;yasinmpbedford&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="context">
      
      
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/yasinmpbedford" data-user-id="887252498054033408">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The back door privatisation going on right now in the NHS. This forensic piece from <a href="/openDemocracy" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15876845"><s>@</s><b>openDemocracy</b></a> explains whats going on and why we should be worried. Were joining NHS campaigners in fighting this latest privatisation wheeze<a href="https://t.co/lgBKCndY07" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.opendemocracy.net/ournhs/caroline-molloy/are-cash-strapped-hospitals-walking-into-trap-that-could-cost-nhs-its-family-" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.opendemocracy.net/ournhs/caroline-molloy/are-cash-strapped-hospitals-walking-into-trap-that-could-cost-nhs-its-family-"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">opendemocracy.net/ournhs/carolin</span><span class="invisible">e-molloy/are-cash-strapped-hospitals-walking-into-trap-that-could-cost-nhs-its-family-</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Keir Starmer Retweeted The Times of London</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="965649784727064576" data-item-id="965649784727064576" data-permalink-path="/UKLabour/status/965649784727064576" data-conversation-id="965649784727064576" data-tweet-nonce="965649784727064576-c35dbfc6-39b4-48c4-9851-8ed1ac398d19" data-retweet-id="965865055534354433" data-retweeter="yasinmpbedford" data-screen-name="UKLabour" data-name="The Labour Party" data-user-id="14291684" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14291684&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;UKLabour&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;887252498054033408&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;yasinmpbedford&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Tories have tripled uni <a href="/hashtag/TuitionFees?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TuitionFees</b></a> and slashed further education funding. Now all theyre offering is a review of their broken system.

We dont need a review, we need real change now.

Here are the facts <a href="https://t.co/hhELZamPd4" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/hhELZamPd4</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">It was great to be out in <a href="/hashtag/KingsbrookWard?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>KingsbrookWard</b></a> with <a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></a>, <a href="/cllr_james" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="436249744"><s>@</s><b>cllr_james</b></a> and Labour activists for an excellent session of canvassing. Lots of postive responses on the doorstep.  <a href="/hashtag/LabourDoorstep?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LabourDoorstep</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Labour?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Labour</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/LabourSelfie?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LabourSelfie</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Bedford?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Bedford</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Kingsbrook?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Kingsbrook</b></a><a href="https://t.co/CSNOojhiHN" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/CSNOojhiHN</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour will install sprinklers in all new schools.

Nothing is more important than children being safe at school. <a href="/hashtag/Marr?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marr</b></a><a href="https://t.co/xYL2h94uZn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/angela-rayner-schools-sprinklers-fire-nick-gibb-education-labour-a8215531.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/angela-rayner-schools-sprinklers-fire-nick-gibb-education-labour-a8215531.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">independent.co.uk/news/uk/politi</span><span class="invisible">cs/angela-rayner-schools-sprinklers-fire-nick-gibb-education-labour-a8215531.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>

  </div>
  <ul>

  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></a> notes the govt's proposals will introduce a significant cliff edge for families on UC and currently accessing FSMs, which was previously mitigated under working tax credit.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">With <a href="/JonAshworth" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="143212610"><s>@</s><b>JonAshworth</b></a> - next Secretary of State for Health at <a href="/hashtag/NHSmarch?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHSmarch</b></a> <a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></a> <a href="/BambosMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="102023574"><s>@</s><b>BambosMP</b></a> Only <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> and <a href="/jeremycorbyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></a> will save our <a href="/hashtag/nhs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>nhs</b></a><a href="https://t.co/BzGg7OmFsa" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/BzGg7OmFsa</a></p>

They also met and chatted with <a href="/hashtag/Bedford?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Bedford</b></a> MP Mohammad Yasin about a range of local issues.<a href="https://t.co/5MIfVN4poA" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/5MIfVN4poA</a></p>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7</span>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">These new statistics are shocking. 

The <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> need to get out of the pockets of property speculators and rogue landlords, and on the side of those without a home to call their own.<a href="https://t.co/yiTDBLmUdR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2018/jan/25/rough-sleeper-numbers-in-england-rise-for-seventh-year-running?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Tweet" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2018/jan/25/rough-sleeper-numbers-in-england-rise-for-seventh-year-running?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Tweet"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/society/2018/j</span><span class="invisible">an/25/rough-sleeper-numbers-in-england-rise-for-seventh-year-running?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Tweet</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

Theresa May, as Home Secretary and Prime Minister, was warned by police about the effect of the <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a>' cuts, taking 21,000 police off our streets.<a href="https://t.co/GnvkDqrkY6" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/GnvkDqrkY6</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="956185446161186816" data-item-id="956185446161186816" data-permalink-path="/UKLabour/status/956185446161186816" data-conversation-id="956185446161186816" data-tweet-nonce="956185446161186816-b2ce1f29-069a-492f-aeb0-8d13b313f5bc" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="956186224003309568" data-retweeter="yasinmpbedford" data-screen-name="UKLabour" data-name="The Labour Party" data-user-id="14291684" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;14291684&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;UKLabour&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;The Labour Party&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;887252498054033408&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;yasinmpbedford&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Mohammad Yasin MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="context">
      
          <div class="tweet-context with-icn&#10;    &#10;    ">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Pleased it was confirmed to me in <a href="/gavinshuker" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14567982"><s>@</s><b>gavinshuker</b></a>s  debate on Bedfordshire rail that Minister Jo Johnson will speak to Bedford constituents at a public meeting on detrimental timetable changes - details TBC <a href="/hashtag/saveourtrains?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>saveourtrains</b></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mohammad Yasin MP Retweeted Catherine West</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Ive signed <a href="/CatherineWest1" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="351812038"><s>@</s><b>CatherineWest1</b></a> brilliant cross-party letter to call on Supermarkets to eliminate plastic packaging - wouldnt it be fantastic if they agreed?<a href="https://t.co/SLwvmL6HQd" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/catherinewest1/status/954321654305390593" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/catherinewest1/status/954321654305390593"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/catherinewest1</span><span class="invisible">/status/954321654305390593</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mohammad Yasin MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

We will bring services back under public control to end the waste of taxpayers money and insist that services are run for public good, not private profit.<a href="https://t.co/1s7GcD5MUX" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2018/jan/18/taxpayers-to-foot-200bn-bill-for-pfi-contracts-audit-office?CMP=Share_iOSApp_Other" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2018/jan/18/taxpayers-to-foot-200bn-bill-for-pfi-contracts-audit-office?CMP=Share_iOSApp_Other"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/politics/2018/</span><span class="invisible">jan/18/taxpayers-to-foot-200bn-bill-for-pfi-contracts-audit-office?CMP=Share_iOSApp_Other</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Proud to support the <a href="/ActionOnHearing" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="24862304"><s>@</s><b>ActionOnHearing</b></a> 1,2,3 campaign today<a href="https://t.co/YmUpkpVVu0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/actiononhearing/status/953582600232275969" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/actiononhearing/status/953582600232275969"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/actiononhearin</span><span class="invisible">g/status/953582600232275969</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The collapse of Carillion is a watershed moment. It is time to put an end to the rip-off privatisation policies that have done serious damage to our public services and fleeced taxpayers of billions of pounds.<a href="https://t.co/Q9zjU7o3Mq" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Q9zjU7o3Mq</a></p>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A pleasure to meet <a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></a>  <a href="/Meades4MidBeds" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="757716718512996352"><s>@</s><b>Meades4MidBeds</b></a> and local disability campaigners this morning and discuss the <a href="/BedsRailAccess" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="932906501743706112"><s>@</s><b>BedsRailAccess</b></a> and 'Save our Trains' campaigns.<a href="https://t.co/ex9tXvd5n3" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ex9tXvd5n3</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Care for our oceans and want to save the penguins? We need to <a href="/hashtag/BackTheBlueBelt?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BackTheBlueBelt</b></a> and tell the government to create Marine Protected Areas around UK Overseas Territories. Go to <a href="https://t.co/uKmAlQe3Gm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.greatbritishoceans.org" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.greatbritishoceans.org"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">greatbritishoceans.org</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a> to find out more. 
<a href="/hashtag/plasticpollution?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>plasticpollution</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Penguins?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Penguins</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/LondonZoo?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LondonZoo</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/BluePlanet2?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BluePlanet2</b></a><a href="https://t.co/5mNntNVPyN" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/5mNntNVPyN</a><span class="tweet-poi-geo-text">  At <a href="/search?q=place%3A0952a59fbc56b001" class="js-nav u-textUserColorHover js-geo-pivot-link" data-nav="search" data-place-id="0952a59fbc56b001">ZSL London Zoo</a></span></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">ZSL is proud to be part of <a href="/GBOceans" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="567415275"><s>@</s><b>GBOceans</b></a> &amp; <a href="/hashtag/BackTheBlueBelt?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BackTheBlueBelt</b></a>, working to protect incredible marine life, supported by over 240 MPs across parliament <a href="https://t.co/drrYkd7sLr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://greatbritishoceans.org" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://greatbritishoceans.org"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">greatbritishoceans.org</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/XTDWnhacpO" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/XTDWnhacpO</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Delighted to join with fellow Labour MPs and meet penguins today to <a href="/hashtag/backthebluebelt?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>backthebluebelt</b></a> - our oceans need our support <a href="https://t.co/7XlSHvDkQR" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://greatbritishoceans.org/" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="https://greatbritishoceans.org/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">greatbritishoceans.org</span><span class="invisible">/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/15u5NdsbAj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/15u5NdsbAj</a></p>

            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So important that the <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> is the party of local campaigning. Yes, we need to get rid of this awful, destructive government, but we dont have to wait for that to be effective locally. Great initiative:<a href="https://t.co/8X9eVeFM8R" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-42599895" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-42599895"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politi</span><span class="invisible">cs-42599895</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Doctors, nurses, NHS staff and <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> have been warning <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>Theresa_May</b></a> and <a href="/Jeremy_Hunt" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="112398730"><s>@</s><b>Jeremy_Hunt</b></a> that if they do not act we face another winter crisis in our NHS.

Patients and those who work in our NHS deserve better than this failed Tory Government. <a href="/hashtag/NHSCrisis?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHSCrisis</b></a><a href="https://t.co/7mnWsH0tX1" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/7mnWsH0tX1</a></p>

Lot's of positive responses on the doorstep. <a href="/hashtag/Bedford?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Bedford</b></a><a href="https://t.co/QGgxNoEFuA" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/QGgxNoEFuA</a></p>

The next Labour government will bring our railways into public ownership to work for the many, not the few. <a href="/hashtag/RailFail?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RailFail</b></a><a href="https://t.co/XTKH67hS0T" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/XTKH67hS0T</a></p>

      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Jeremy Corbyn</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>jeremycorbyn</b></span></a>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our NHS is facing another winter crisis.

The <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> could have avoided this by giving the NHS the funding it needs.<a href="https://t.co/451g0CvceM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2017/dec/21/nhs-cancels-surgery-tens-of-thousands-avoid-winter-crisis?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Messages" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2017/dec/21/nhs-cancels-surgery-tens-of-thousands-avoid-winter-crisis?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Messages"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">theguardian.com/society/2017/d</span><span class="invisible">ec/21/nhs-cancels-surgery-tens-of-thousands-avoid-winter-crisis?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Messages</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The stocking has been a little empty for the last seven years. Public sector pay has increased just 4.4% while the cost of living has soared by 22%. Our council, schools, police, NHS and public service staff are working for less pay every year. <a href="/hashtag/payupnow?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>payupnow</b></a> <a href="https://t.co/d6x36YUwzJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://unison.org.uk/payupnow" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://unison.org.uk/payupnow"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">unison.org.uk/payupnow</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/EKuvrxR8m1" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/EKuvrxR8m1</a></p>
</div>

      <div class="child-confirmation-item">

Plight of every <a href="/hashtag/MP?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>MP</b></a>s thousands of <a href="/hashtag/WASPI?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WASPI</b></a> constituents more important than party politics.<a href="https://t.co/IXGIoP2JGh" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/WASPI_Campaign/status/940564962417827840" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/WASPI_Campaign/status/940564962417827840"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/WASPI_Campaign</span><span class="invisible">/status/940564962417827840</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Massively important vote in the Commons just now. Ayes 309, Noes 305. May defeated for the first time on the EU Withdrawal Bill. Any final Brexit deal with the European Union would now have to be passed by statute in Parliament. Huge check &amp; balance on unaccountable Govt power.</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tory failure on housing and homelessness is disgraceful: fewer homes built than under any political party since 1920s; fewest affordable homes built for 24 years; homelessness up by 50% and rough sleeping doubled. <a href="/hashtag/PMQs?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>PMQs</b></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">This morning I attended the Action Cerebral Palsy drop in session to discuss what action is needed to overcome the many barriers that hinder local services from identifying cerebral palsy and intervening quickly.<a href="https://t.co/xd7gDoP8go" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/xd7gDoP8go</a></p>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">NHF's CEO Hilary Hall talked to Bedford MP Mohammed Yasin <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></span> today about the vital contribution salons &amp; barbershops make to the UK economy and the high street.</div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Trump's recognition of Jerusalem as Israel's capital, including occupied Palestinian territory, is a reckless threat to peace. The British Government must condemn this dangerous act and work for a just and viable settlement of the conflict.</p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Last night, <a href="/theresa_may" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="747807250819981312"><s>@</s><b>Theresa_May</b></a>'s social mobility adviser and his entire team quit, stating that the Prime Minister is unable to build a "fairer Britain".

In her first speech as PM she promised to tackle "burning injustices", but her record since is one of failure and unfairness.<a href="https://t.co/uyQyG7Ha8F" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/uyQyG7Ha8F</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Theresa May is standing foursquare behind Britains tax dependencies via <a href="/guardian" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="87818409"><s>@</s><b>guardian</b></a> Every pound of tax avoided through tax havens is a pound less for our schools, NHS and child care. Wrong priorities. Wrong values. Wrong government.<a href="https://t.co/2j6hQDvyYU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://amp.theguardian.com/world/2017/dec/02/tax-havens-theresa-may-backing-british-dependencies" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://amp.theguardian.com/world/2017/dec/02/tax-havens-theresa-may-backing-british-dependencies"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">amp.theguardian.com/world/2017/dec</span><span class="invisible">/02/tax-havens-theresa-may-backing-british-dependencies</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;           <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">In less than 24 hours 127 MPs and Peers co-signed my letter to <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="932446861"><s>@</s><b>JustineGreening</b></span> demanding the Government publish a comprehensive equality impact assessment of <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Budget2017</b></span> and future policies. <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/MudKvDEWAY</span></div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>



            <span class="js-retweet-text">

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Great to meet <a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></a> and have his support for <a href="/NALC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20527656"><s>@</s><b>NALC</b></a> s <a href="/hashtag/DiversityWork?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>DiversityWork</b></a>.             <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today, held a surgery at Kempston library and street surgery in Bedford town centre by the silver faces. 

Discussed Homelessness, Social Care, Universal Credits and Local policing amongst many other issues.<a href="https://t.co/VUeHodjQBG" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/VUeHodjQBG</a></p>
</div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Today, had the pleasure of visiting Bedford Daycare Hospice on Linden Road, and meeting the wonderful Linda Byer and Dr Tom Inskip.

Huge thank you to the staff and volunteers for their hard work.<a href="https://t.co/WhqT4XfX2D" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/WhqT4XfX2D</a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/BorisJohnson" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3131144855"><s>@</s><b>BorisJohnson</b></a> promised <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Britain?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Britain</b></a> 350 m a week on the <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a>. In <a href="/hashtag/Budget17?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Budget17</b></a>, just 350 m for the whole Winter!<a href="https://t.co/wGefbMfYrU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/health/budget-2017-nhs-funding-trust-winter-brexit-bus-promise-350-million-leave-eu-hospitals-staff-a8069481.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/health/budget-2017-nhs-funding-trust-winter-brexit-bus-promise-350-million-leave-eu-hospitals-staff-a8069481.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">independent.co.uk/news/health/bu</span><span class="invisible">dget-2017-nhs-funding-trust-winter-brexit-bus-promise-350-million-leave-eu-hospitals-staff-a8069481.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

* Universal Credit roll-out paused
* Public sector pay cap removed
* Serious funding for infrastructure across the country
* Proper funding of health, education &amp; local government.
* Building of new houses to meet demand <a href="/hashtag/TansWishlist?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TansWishlist</b></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At the very least, the Tories must use Wednesdays <a href="/hashtag/Budget2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Budget2017</b></a> to end their damaging cuts to the education system. Labour would go further.<a href="https://t.co/NOBP9GqQ8M" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/NOBP9GqQ8M</a></p>

    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">After WWII Labour created the National Health Service. The next Labour Government will create a National Education Service - providing education from the cradle to the grave, free at the point of use.</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">NHS funding crisis, waiting lists at 4 mill, 565,000 trolley waits, 2.5 mill waited beyond 4 hours a&amp;e, almost 27,000 waited beyond 2 month for cancer treatment.       <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">23</span>
  </span>

  </button>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">

  </div>

</div>
  



      
      

      

      

    </div>

  </div>

  <div class="dismissed-module">
    <div class="feedback-actions">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/yasinmpbedford" data-user-id="887252498054033408">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Mohammad Yasin MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>yasinmpbedford</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mohammad Yasin MP Retweeted Philipa Tolley</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">A real pleasure <a href="/PhilipaTolley" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3080220352"><s>@</s><b>PhilipaTolley</b></a><a href="https://t.co/eqiCpMxfAo" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/philipatolley/status/928393164934787073" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/philipatolley/status/928393164934787073"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/philipatolley/</span><span class="invisible">status/928393164934787073</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our new research today shows over 110,000 waited over an hour in the back of ambulance outside hospital in last year<a href="https://t.co/m4fTYtR3Hq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://news.sky.com/story/ambulance-delays-at-accident-emergency-more-than-double-11110825" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://news.sky.com/story/ambulance-delays-at-accident-emergency-more-than-double-11110825"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">news.sky.com/story/ambulanc</span><span class="invisible">e-delays-at-accident-emergency-more-than-double-11110825</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Mohammad Yasin MP Retweeted James Valentine</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great to be out today meeting constituents in Kempston earlier -thanks <a href="/JamesEValentine" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="226623189"><s>@</s><b>JamesEValentine</b></a>, &amp; Cllrs Will &amp; Shan Hunt<a href="https://t.co/U0JcwRuwsn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jamesevalentine/status/926114162245296128" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jamesevalentine/status/926114162245296128"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jamesevalentin</span><span class="invisible">e/status/926114162245296128</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mohammad Yasin MP added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Jeremy Corbyn Retweeted Theresa May</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This was a u-turn, after pressure from Labour, on your own policy to attack supported housing. Why did you propose it in the first place?<a href="https://t.co/p4Gy0R7N9k" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/923468084664520704" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/theresa_may/status/923468084664520704"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/theresa_may/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/923468084664520704</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Jeremy Corbyn added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="923468084664520704" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="theresa_may" data-user-id="747807250819981312" href="/theresa_may/status/923468084664520704" data-conversation-id="923468084664520704" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Theresa May</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>theresa_may</b></span>
  </div>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Present in todays debate to tell the Tories it's time to end their unfair cuts to social care.<a href="https://t.co/Ov8caPqszg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/923141657696104448" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/923141657696104448"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKLabour/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/923141657696104448</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Told people wouldn't be worse off on <a href="/hashtag/UniversalCredit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>UniversalCredit</b></a> if they worked. Not the case says <a href="/yasinmpbedford" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="887252498054033408"><s>@</s><b>yasinmpbedford</b></a> from local Bedford experiences</p>

      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Unlike the <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a>, Labour will clamp down on tax avoidance and build an economy which works for the many<a href="https://t.co/TpEGTqxIqK" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/labour-takes-aim-tax-havens-11343866" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/politics/labour-takes-aim-tax-havens-11343866"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">mirror.co.uk/news/politics/</span><span class="invisible">labour-takes-aim-tax-havens-11343866</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Attended <a href="/BedfordIndComm" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2799639083"><s>@</s><b>BedfordIndComm</b></a> Festival of Lights this afternoon with lots of talented performers, singers, dancers, musicians &amp; more.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">45 overseas nurses refused jobs in Bedford &amp; 15 in Luton despite shortages.  Can't trust the Tories with our NHS.<a href="https://t.co/4As2Gg0fDc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-35313325" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.com/news/uk-england-35313325"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.com/news/uk-englan</span><span class="invisible">d-35313325</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">

  <ul>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tax avoidance is a scourge on society that deprives our public services of the funds they desperately need.<a href="https://t.co/3ZS9NUa7Uq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/tax-avoidance-cost-uk-economy-13-billion-labour-peter-dowd-a7929666.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/tax-avoidance-cost-uk-economy-13-billion-labour-peter-dowd-a7929666.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">independent.co.uk/news/uk/politi</span><span class="invisible">cs/tax-avoidance-cost-uk-economy-13-billion-labour-peter-dowd-a7929666.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Mohammad Yasin MP added,</p>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-902507676004999170">

    </div>

  </span>

  </button>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Under the Tories, youre paying 27% more on rail. And while fares are rising, standards certainly arent. Take a look <a href="https://t.co/YkJUGhfu45" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/YkJUGhfu45</a></p>
</div>


      

      
            <div class="AdaptiveMediaOuterContainer">
    <div class="AdaptiveMedia&#10;        &#10;        &#10;        is-video&#10;        &#10;        has-autoplayable-media&#10;        ">
      <div class="AdaptiveMedia-container">
          <div class="AdaptiveMedia-video">
  <div class="AdaptiveMedia-videoContainer">
      <div class="PlayableMedia PlayableMedia--video PlayableMedia--hasMetadata watched">


  <div class="PlayableMedia-container">
    <div class="PlayableMedia-player&#10;        &#10;        " data-playable-media-url="" data-use-react-player="" data-border-top-left-radius="" data-border-top-right-radius="" data-border-bottom-left-radius="" data-border-bottom-right-radius="" style="padding-bottom: 56.25%; background-image:url('https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DGKJp87XYAAA3aC.jpg')">
    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">With the Tories, rail fares keep rising  but standards aren't.</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">Under the Tories, youre paying 27% more on rail than in 2010. Lets put our transport back on track: well being rail into public ownership, so we can put passengers first and keep costs down.</div>
        </div>
  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angela Rayner Retweeted The Guardian</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Tories promised energy price cap in their manifesto but today price increase by British Gas was 12.5%, will Tories now apologise to voters?<a href="https://t.co/MkcuYPYh80" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/guardian/status/892446505830948865" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/guardian/status/892446505830948865"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/guardian/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/892446505830948865</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
